title: Ulaga Nayagane Song Lyrics Dasavathaaram
stanzas: <div>Ulaga Nayagane Song Lyrics Dasavathaaram

Come Dance With Me
Before You Go
Come Dance With Me
Before You Go

ulagam engilum
unnai minjida yaaru
unnai pettradhil
perumai kolludhu naadu(2)

ulaga nayagane
ulaga nayagane
kandangal kandu viyakkum
ini ayinaavum unnai alaikkum

ulagam engilum
unnai minjida yaaru
unnai pettradhil
perumai kolludhu naadu

ulaga nayagane
ulaga nayagane
kandangal kandu viyakkum
ini ayinaavum unnai alaikkum

Come Dance With Me
Before You Go
Come Dance With Me
Before You Go

nee perum kalaignan
niranthara ilaignan
rasanai migundha
ragasiya kavignan (2)

orr uyir kondu
ulagathil indru
aayiram piravi kondaai
un vazhvil
aayiram piraigal kandaai

sothanai unnai
soozhndhu nindraalum
sorthanai muyarchi
sorvura villai.

ayindhu mudhal nee
aadi vanthaalum
oxygen kuraiya villai
sonnaal kael
oscar thooram illai.

ulagam engilum
unnai minjida yaaru
unnai pettradhil
perumai kolludhu naadu

ulaga nayagane
ulaga nayagane
kandangal kandu viyakkum
ini ayinaavum
will call you ..

Come Dance With Me
Before You Go
Come Dance With Me
Before You Go

udal konda manithan
oar avathaaram
ullathin kanakkil
noor avathaaram

mugangalai urithu
manangalai padithu
perukkonde arivu kondaai
vigynaani ..
purindhu kondaai.

vilaigalukkulle
virichangal thoongum
un ovvanukulle
ulagangal thoongum

neruppinil kidandhu
nedandavar siranthu
nee en nilai kandthaai
ippodhu nirubanam
aagivittaai.

ulagam engilum
unnai minjida yaaru
unnai pettradhil
perumai kolludhu naadu

ulaga nayagane
ulaga nayagane
kandangal kandu viyakkum
ini ayinaavum unnai alaikkum
ulaga nayagane (4)

Come Dance With Me
Before You Go

seo.title: Ulaga Nayagane Song Lyrics Dasavathaaram
seo.description: Get the complete Ulaga Nayagane Song Lyrics Dasavathaaram from Dasavathaaram. Read the lyrics penned by Vairamuthu and composed by Himesh Reshammiya and sung by Vinit Singh. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Dasavathaaram, Himesh Reshammiya, Vinit Singh, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
